alderman.name: Daniel La Spata
alderman.biography: Daniel La Spata has served as Alderman of the 1st Ward since 2019. He represents Wicker Park, Ukrainian Village, and surrounding areas. He focuses on affordable housing, transportation, and community development.

events.title: Ward 1 Community Meeting
events.description: Monthly community meeting to discuss local issues and upcoming projects.

events.title: Affordable Housing Forum
events.description: Discussion on new affordable housing initiatives in the ward.

alderman.name: Brian Hopkins
alderman.biography: Brian Hopkins has represented the 2nd Ward since 2015. He represents Lincoln Park, Old Town, and surrounding areas. He is known for his work on public safety and economic development.

events.title: Public Safety Town Hall
events.description: Community discussion on public safety initiatives and police-community relations.

alderman.name: Pat Dowell
alderman.biography: Pat Dowell has served the 3rd Ward since 2007. She represents Bronzeville, Douglas, and surrounding areas. She focuses on economic development, education, and community revitalization.

events.title: Small Business Workshop
events.description: Workshop for local small business owners on city resources and permits.

alderman.name: Lamont Robinson
alderman.biography: Lamont Robinson has served the 4th Ward since 2019. He represents Kenwood, Hyde Park, and surrounding areas. He focuses on education, economic development, and community safety.

events.title: Education Forum
events.description: Community discussion on local education initiatives and school improvements.

alderman.name: Desmon Yancy
alderman.office: 6354 S Cottage Grove Ave, Chicago, IL 60637
alderman.biography: Desmon Yancy has served the 5th Ward since 2023. He represents Woodlawn, South Shore, and surrounding areas. He focuses on community development, public safety, and economic opportunities.

events.title: Community Development Meeting
events.description: Discussion on upcoming community development projects and neighborhood improvements.

alderman.name: William Hall
alderman.biography: William Hall has served the 6th Ward since 2019. He represents Englewood and surrounding areas. He focuses on economic development, public safety, and community revitalization.

events.title: Englewood Economic Summit
events.description: Community discussion on economic development opportunities and business growth.

alderman.name: Gregory Mitchell
alderman.biography: Gregory Mitchell has served the 7th Ward since 2015. He represents South Chicago and surrounding areas. He focuses on infrastructure improvements, public safety, and community engagement.

events.title: Infrastructure Town Hall
events.description: Public meeting to discuss upcoming infrastructure projects and improvements.

alderman.name: Michelle Harris
alderman.office: 8534 S Cottage Grove Ave, Chicago, IL 60619
alderman.biography: Michelle Harris has served the 8th Ward since 2006. She represents Chatham and surrounding areas. She focuses on economic development, public safety, and community services.

events.title: Chatham Business Forum
events.description: Networking event for local businesses and discussion on economic opportunities.

alderman.name: Anthony Beale
alderman.biography: Anthony Beale has served the 9th Ward since 1999. He represents Roseland and surrounding areas. He focuses on economic development, public safety, and community revitalization.

events.title: Roseland Job Fair
events.description: Job fair connecting residents with local employment opportunities.

alderman.name: Susan Sadlowski Garza
alderman.biography: Susan Sadlowski Garza has served the 10th Ward since 2015. She represents East Side and surrounding areas. She focuses on environmental justice, public safety, and community development.

events.title: Environmental Justice Forum
events.description: Community discussion on environmental issues and environmental justice initiatives.
